GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

article.title: Running a Node App
article.body: This is part two of a series on how to get up and running with Systemd and Node.js. This part dives deeper into how to successfully run your app with systemd long-term, and how to set it up in a production environment.
article.author: jessjelly

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments about article specified by article id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts new comment with reference to article and user

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates vote count on article by id
